mapper.sql: ID,ACCOUNT_ID, USER_ID, USER_ACCOUNT_ID, ACCOUNT_TYPE, ACCOUNT_NAME, ACCOUNT_NO, BANK_PROVINCE, BANK_CITY, BANK_BRANCH, BANK_CODE, CARDHOLDER_NAME, CARDHOLDER_CERTICODE, CARDHOLDER_CERTITYPE, BANKMOBILE, STATUS, OPUSER, ISVALID, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE
mapper.update: update T_USER_PAYACCOUNT SET ISVALID='0' where ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.insert: insert ignore into T_USER_PAYACCOUNT (ACCOUNT_ID, USER_ID, USER_ACCOUNT_ID, ACCOUNT_TYPE, ACCOUNT_NAME, ACCOUNT_NO, BANK_PROVINCE, BANK_CITY, BANK_BRANCH, BANK_CODE, CARDHOLDER_NAME, CARDHOLDER_CERTICODE, CARDHOLDER_CERTITYPE, BANKMOBILE, STATUS, OPUSER, ISVALID, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE ) values (#{accountId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userAccountId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{accountType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankBranch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardholderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardholderCerticode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardholderCertitype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankmobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '1', #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.select: select from T_USER_PAYACCOUNT where ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId,jdbcType=CHAR} AND ISVALID = '1'
